name: Berry Match 3 Deluxe
description:
Berry Match 3 Deluxe is the highly addictive casual game with unlimited interesting levels. Berry Match 3 Deluxe is consists of unlimited levels & better than any match three game. Each level is like new puzzle to solve. You have to complete each level in limited moves. If you like challenges than this game is just for you.

FEATURES:
- Stuck in any level??? Just use the power-up to clear the level
- All POWER-UPS are freely available in Berry Match 3 Deluxe
- Nice game music
- Awesome game graphics

Share this game with friends & compete them with your highscore.
